hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Abbas that he heard that people were leasing out land more. He said:“Subhan-Allah, the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: 'Why does not one of you lend it to his brother?' But he did not forbid leasing it out.' ”

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي كِرَاءِ الأَرْضِ الْبَيْضَاءِ بِالذَّهَبِ وَالْفِضَّةِ
chapter.eng-name: Concession Allowing Leasing Out Barren Land For Gold And Silver
